careers.title: Job Opportunities
careers.description:
At Centro Educativo Villa de Ángeles, we are committed to educational excellence and seek professionals passionate about teaching and the comprehensive development of our students. For teaching positions, we require preschool and elementary school teachers with academic training in education, proven experience, group management skills, creativity, a service-oriented attitude, and the ability to work in a team. In the administrative area, we look for organized, responsible collaborators with experience in school management, customer service, or related fields.

If you share our vision and want to be part of a team dedicated to shaping future generations, send us your updated résumé and join our educational mission.
